attributes.action: Ban fireworks think of the animals
attributes.additional_details: I think fireworks should be banned and shops and retailers need to stop selling them we need to think of the animals and our pets that get stressed from fireworks and can and has lead to family pets to die due to the stress and also we need to think about the elderly fireworks can cause them stress
attributes.background: Fireworks need to be banned we need to think of our pets and other animals who get stressed and can and has lead to animals and peoples pet to die

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599738
